fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Don a bulletproof vest at night. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - On day 4, you will become a different role in the GIM thread. This will be announced to the town. You will become a role that is a member of any factions present in the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Become your actual role and fulfill its win condition.
